answers.answer: Hi,Has he spoke with his doctor about any of this? If not, you should urge him to make an appointment to be examined by his doctor, so that he can determine what the cause is... There are a variety of things that could cause this condition; an injury, nerve damage, diabetes, and so on. He needs to be diagnosed by a doctor, in order to find out his treatment options.Good Luck

question: I love my husband very much, but I am worried about him because he lacks confidence in bed. He is having problems with his penis as far as having any sort of normal sensation. He can't feel anything while we have sex, but he has an orgasm very quickly. He gets so upset with himself, because he feels like he's letting me down. What can be the cause of the lack of sensation in the penis? How can he last longer, so he feels confident again? Any help would be great.
title: Unsure of what to do.
